description: 🤖 Appel Gemini simplifié - sans caractères problématiques

actions.command: echo 'Create a JSON luciform for a planet-saving golem. Include concrete actions and the signature. Respond only with JSON.' > simple_prompt.txt

PROMPT=$(cat simple_prompt.txt) && API_KEY=$(grep GEMINI_API_KEY .env | cut -d'=' -f2) && curl -X POST "https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash:generateContent?key=$API_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"contents\":[{\"parts\":[{\"text\":\"$PROMPT\"}]}]}" > gemini_real_response.json
